meanings.definition: A person who is clever or intelligent.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a real smarty when it comes to math.
meanings.sent2: The teacher praised the young girl for being a smarty in class.
meanings.sent3: The smarty in our group always has the best ideas for games.
meanings.sent4: She was the ultimate smarty, always finding solutions to our problems.
meanings.sent5: Being a smarty helped him excel in his studies.

meanings.definition: A device or software that assists in solving problems or providing information.
meanings.sent1: The new smarty on my phone helps me find the best restaurants.
meanings.sent2: I rely on the smarty in my car to navigate through traffic.
meanings.sent3: The smarty on my computer never fails to give me the right answers.
meanings.sent4: The smarty in the library catalog makes finding books so easy.
meanings.sent5: Having a smarty like that makes my work much simpler.

meanings.sent1: She couldn't help but make a smarty about his outfit.

meanings.sent5: The unexpected smarty left everyone speechless.
